p: Our project has been conducted in the FEZ region (34° 01′59 ″ North Latitude and 5° 00′01 ″ Longitude West) with the village of Ouled Jama located at 333 meters (34° 13′48 ″N and 5° 4′48 ″ W) and the region of SAFI located 45 meters above sea level (32° 17. 9634′ North Latitude, 9° 14. 2308′ Longitude: West) with the village Sebt Gzoula (Latitude: 32 07′ 00′′ latitude North (-9 05′ 00′′ West longitude) ( Figure 1).
